basic.Target Organism: [Ref.25069749] Gram-positive bacteria :Staphylococcus aureus (ATCC 25923)(MIC=1.56 μg/ml), Bacillus cereus(MIC=3.15 μg/ml);Gram-negative bacteria :E. coli (ATCC 9637)(MIC=25 μg/ml), Pseudomonas aeruginosa (ATCC BAA-427)(MIC=25 μg/ml), Klebsiella pneumoniae (ATCC 27736)(MIC=3.15 μg/ml);Fungi :Sporothrix schenckii(MIC=3.15 μg/ml), Trichophyton mentagrophytes(MIC=6.25 μg/ml), Aspergillus fumigatus(MIC=6.25 μg/ml), Candida parapsilosis (ATCC 22019)(MIC=6.25 μg/ml)
